quiz.question: ____ bargain
quiz.explanation: 便宜货, 好便宜货. I got a good bargain at the sale. 我在大减价中得到了好便宜货。

quiz.question: ____ porcelain
quiz.explanation: 瓷器, 精美瓷器. The museum displayed fine porcelain from China. 博物馆展示了来自中国的精美瓷器。

quiz.question: plain _____
quiz.explanation: 明白的, 明白的真相. He told us the plain truth about the situation. 他告诉我们关于情况的明白真相。

quiz.question: _____________ legerdemain
quiz.explanation: 戏法, 复杂的戏法. The magician performed sophisticated legerdemain. 魔术师表演了复杂的戏法。

quiz.question: refrain ____
quiz.explanation: 克制, 克制于. Please refrain from smoking in this area. 请在该区域克制吸烟。

quiz.question: grain ____
quiz.explanation: 谷物, 谷物筒仓. The farmer stored wheat in the grain silo. 农民把小麦存放在谷物筒仓里。

quiz.question: _____ terrain
quiz.explanation: 地形, 岩石地形. Hikers struggled over the rocky terrain. 徒步旅行者在岩石地形上艰难行进。

quiz.question: detain _ _______
quiz.explanation: 拘留, 拘留嫌疑人. Police have authority to detain a suspect. 警察有权拘留嫌疑人。

quiz.question: retain _______
quiz.explanation: 保留, 保留控制权. The company struggled to retain control. 公司努力保留控制权。

quiz.question: contain ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 控制, 控制蔓延. Measures were taken to contain the spread. 采取措施控制蔓延。

quiz.question: stain _______
quiz.explanation: 污渍, 去污剂. Use stain remover for tough marks. 使用去污剂去除顽固污渍。

quiz.question: _____ ____ distain
quiz.explanation: 玷污, 用污渍玷污. The scandal would stain with distain his reputation. 丑闻会用污渍玷污他的声誉。

quiz.question: sustain ______
quiz.explanation: 维持, 维持增长. The economy must sustain growth. 经济必须维持增长。

quiz.question: attain _ ____
quiz.explanation: 达到, 达到目标. With hard work, you can attain a goal. 通过努力工作,你可以达到目标。

quiz.question: _____ bin
quiz.explanation: 垃圾箱, 垃圾箱. Please put litter in the trash bin. 请把垃圾放进垃圾箱。

quiz.question: _________ din
quiz.explanation: 喧闹, 震耳欲聋的喧闹. The construction created a deafening din. 建筑工地制造了震耳欲聋的喧闹。

quiz.question: ____ skein
quiz.explanation: 一绞, 一绞纱线. She bought a yarn skein for knitting. 她买了一绞纱线用于编织。

quiz.question: urchin ___
quiz.explanation: 顽童, 顽童男孩. The urchin boy begged on the streets. 顽童男孩在街上乞讨。

quiz.question: _____ kin
quiz.explanation: 亲属, 近亲. She visited her close kin regularly. 她定期拜访她的近亲。

quiz.question: maudlin _________
quiz.explanation: 感伤的, 感伤的情绪. The movie was criticized for maudlin sentiment. 这部电影因感伤的情绪而受到批评。

quiz.question: tarpaulin _____
quiz.explanation: 防水布, 防水布罩. Workers placed a tarpaulin cover over the cargo. 工人在货物上放置了防水布罩。

quiz.question: _______ rejoin
quiz.explanation: 回答, 机智地回答. She would wittily rejoin to criticism. 她会机智地回答批评。

quiz.question: enjoin _______ ____
quiz.explanation: 禁止, 禁止某人. The court will enjoin someone from further action. 法院将禁止某人采取进一步行动。

quiz.question: conjoin ______
quiz.explanation: 结合, 结合力量. Allies decided to conjoin forces. 盟友决定结合力量。

quiz.question: purloin _ ______
quiz.explanation: 偷窃, 偷窃信件. The spy managed to purloin a letter. 间谍设法偷窃了信件。

quiz.question: spin ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 编造, 编造故事. Politicians often spin the story to their advantage. 政客经常为自己的利益编造故事。

quiz.question: saccharin _________
quiz.explanation: 糖精, 糖精甜味. The drink had an artificial saccharin sweetness. 这种饮料有人工的糖精甜味。

quiz.question: grin _______
quiz.explanation: 露齿笑, 开心地露齿笑. He began to grin broadly at the joke. 他开始对这个笑话开心地露齿笑。

quiz.question: ____ chagrin
quiz.explanation: 懊恼, 感到懊恼. She would feel chagrin at the mistake. 她会对错误感到懊恼。

quiz.question: ____ resin
quiz.explanation: 树脂, 松树脂. Pine resin was used to seal boats. 松树脂被用来密封船只。

quiz.question: toxin ________
quiz.explanation: 毒素, 毒素暴露. Workers feared toxin exposure at the plant. 工人担心在工厂的毒素暴露。

quiz.question: condemn ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 谴责, 谴责袭击. World leaders united to condemn the attack. 世界领导人团结起来谴责袭击。

quiz.question: solemn ________
quiz.explanation: 庄严的, 庄严的仪式. The memorial featured a solemn ceremony. 纪念活动以庄严的仪式为特色。

quiz.question: limn _ ________
quiz.explanation: 描绘, 描绘肖像. The artist would limn a portrait in detail. 艺术家会详细描绘肖像。

quiz.question: ______ hymn
quiz.explanation: 赞美诗, 教堂赞美诗. The congregation sang a church hymn. 会众唱了教堂赞美诗。

quiz.question: beacon _____
quiz.explanation: 信标, 信标灯. The beacon light guided ships to shore. 信标灯引导船只靠岸。

quiz.question: ___ pantechnicon
quiz.explanation: 搬家车, 旧搬家车. An old pantechnicon transported furniture. 一辆旧搬家车运送家具。

quiz.question: _____ lexicon
quiz.explanation: 词汇, 法律词汇. Lawyers must master the legal lexicon. 律师必须掌握法律词汇。

quiz.question: ______ curmudgeon
quiz.explanation: 脾气坏的老头, 脾气暴躁的老头. The cranky curmudgeon complained about everything. 脾气暴躁的老头抱怨一切。

quiz.question: _____ surgeon
quiz.explanation: 外科医生, 心脏外科医生. The heart surgeon performed a bypass. 心脏外科医生进行了搭桥手术。

quiz.question: _____ pantheon
quiz.explanation: 万神殿, 罗马万神殿. The Roman pantheon is an architectural marvel. 罗马万神殿是建筑奇迹。

quiz.question: _ paragon __ ______
quiz.explanation: 典范, 美德的典范. She was considered a paragon of virtue. 她被认为是美德的典范。

quiz.question: _______ hexagon
quiz.explanation: 六边形, 正六边形. A honeycomb forms a regular hexagon pattern. 蜂巢形成正六边形图案。

quiz.question: _________ jargon
quiz.explanation: 行话, 技术行话. The manual was filled with technical jargon. 手册充满了技术行话。

quiz.question: ______ suspicion
quiz.explanation: 怀疑, 引起怀疑. His behavior began to arouse suspicion. 他的行为开始引起怀疑。

quiz.question: ___ coercion
quiz.explanation: 强制, 使用强制. The confession was obtained by use coercion. 供词是通过使用强制获得的。

quiz.question: scion __ _ ______
quiz.explanation: 后裔, 家族后裔. He was the scion of a family dynasty. 他是家族王朝的后裔。

quiz.question: _ legion __ ____
quiz.explanation: 大批, 大批粉丝. The singer attracted a legion of fans. 歌手吸引了大批粉丝。

quiz.question: ____ battalion
quiz.explanation: 营, 陆军营. The army battalion deployed to the border. 陆军营部署到边境。

quiz.question: ______ rapscallion
quiz.explanation: 流氓, 小流氓. The little rapscallion stole from the market. 小流氓从市场偷东西。

quiz.question: ____ bullion
quiz.explanation: 金条, 金条. The vault contained gold bullion bars. 金库里有金条。

quiz.question: ______ companion
quiz.explanation: 同伴, 旅行同伴. She found a reliable travel companion. 她找到了一个可靠的旅行同伴。

quiz.question: champion ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 拥护, 拥护事业. Activists champion the cause of justice. 活动家拥护正义事业。

quiz.question: _________ scorpion
quiz.explanation: 蝎子, 有毒的蝎子. The desert harbored poisonous scorpion. 沙漠藏有有毒的蝎子。

quiz.question: clarion ____
quiz.explanation: 嘹亮的, 嘹亮的号召. The leader issued a clarion call to action. 领导人发出了嘹亮的行动号召。

quiz.question: __________ criterion
quiz.explanation: 标准, 评估标准. Quality is the primary evaluation criterion. 质量是主要的评估标准。

quiz.question: carrion ______
quiz.explanation: 腐肉, 食腐动物. Vultures are carrion feeder birds. 秃鹫是食腐动物。

quiz.question: _____ centurion
quiz.explanation: 百夫长, 罗马百夫长. The Roman centurion commanded one hundred soldiers. 罗马百夫长指挥一百名士兵。

quiz.question: ____ abrasion
quiz.explanation: 擦伤, 皮肤擦伤. The fall caused a minor skin abrasion. 跌倒造成了轻微的皮肤擦伤。

quiz.question: ___ evasion
quiz.explanation: 逃避, 逃税. The businessman was charged with tax evasion. 这位商人被指控逃税。

quiz.question: _____ cohesion
quiz.explanation: 凝聚力, 团队凝聚力. Strong leadership promotes group cohesion. 强有力的领导促进团队凝聚力。

quiz.question: ____ lesion
quiz.explanation: 损伤, 皮肤损伤. The doctor examined the skin lesion carefully. 医生仔细检查了皮肤损伤。

quiz.question: ________ incision
quiz.explanation: 切口, 手术切口. The surgeon made a precise surgical incision. 外科医生做了精确的手术切口。

quiz.question: ____-__ collision
quiz.explanation: 碰撞, 正面碰撞. The vehicles were involved in a head-on collision. 车辆发生了正面碰撞。

quiz.question: _____ prevision
quiz.explanation: 预见, 清晰的预见. The prophet claimed clear prevision of events. 先知声称对事件有清晰的预见。

quiz.question: envision ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 设想, 设想未来. Leaders must envision the future. 领导者必须设想未来。

quiz.question: ____ provision
quiz.explanation: 供应, 食物供应. Hikers packed food provision for the trip. 徒步旅行者为旅行准备了食物供应。

quiz.question: ______ repulsion
quiz.explanation: 排斥, 强烈的排斥. She felt strong repulsion at the sight. 她对这景象感到强烈的排斥。

quiz.question: ____________ compulsion
quiz.explanation: 强迫, 不可抗拒的强迫. He felt an irresistible compulsion to confess. 他感到一种不可抗拒的坦白强迫。

quiz.question: ______ propulsion
quiz.explanation: 推进, 火箭推进. The spacecraft uses rocket propulsion. 航天器使用火箭推进。

quiz.question: ______ convulsion
quiz.explanation: 痉挛, 肌肉痉挛. The patient experienced muscle convulsion. 患者经历了肌肉痉挛。

quiz.question: _____ mansion
quiz.explanation: 豪宅, 宏伟的豪宅. The millionaire owned a grand mansion. 百万富翁拥有一座宏伟的豪宅。

quiz.question: _______ dimension
quiz.explanation: 维度, 空间维度. The problem involves multiple spatial dimension. 这个问题涉及多个空间维度。

quiz.question: pension ____
quiz.explanation: 养老金, 养老金基金. Workers contribute to the pension fund. 工人向养老金基金缴款。

quiz.question: ______ pretension
quiz.explanation: 自命不凡, 社会自命不凡. Her social pretension annoyed friends. 她的社会自命不凡惹恼了朋友。

quiz.question: hypertension _______
quiz.explanation: 高血压, 高血压患者. The hypertension patient takes daily medication. 高血压患者每天服药。

quiz.question: _________ distension
quiz.explanation: 膨胀, 腹部膨胀. The doctor noted abdominal distension. 医生注意到腹部膨胀。

quiz.question: ______ aversion
quiz.explanation: 厌恶, 强烈的厌恶. He developed a strong aversion to crowds. 他对人群产生了强烈的厌恶。

quiz.question: _____ reversion
quiz.explanation: 恢复, 产权恢复. The contract stipulated title reversion. 合同规定了产权恢复。

quiz.question: _______ excursion
quiz.explanation: 远足, 周末远足. The family planned a weekend excursion. 家人计划了周末远足。

quiz.question: ____ compassion
quiz.explanation: 同情, 表现同情. We must show compassion for the suffering. 我们必须对受苦的人表现同情。

quiz.question: ____ cession
quiz.explanation: 割让, 土地割让. The treaty involved land cession. 条约涉及土地割让。

quiz.question: ________ recession
quiz.explanation: 衰退, 经济衰退. The country entered an economic recession. 国家进入了经济衰退。

quiz.question: ____ _ concession
quiz.explanation: 让步, 做出让步. Negotiators agreed to make a concession. 谈判者同意做出让步。

quiz.question: _____ digression
quiz.explanation: 离题, 短暂的离题. After a brief digression, we returned to the topic. 经过短暂的离题后,我们回到话题。

quiz.question: _____ transgression
quiz.explanation: 违反, 严重的违反. The offense was a grave transgression. 该罪行是严重的违反。

quiz.question: ________ depression
quiz.explanation: 抑郁症, 临床抑郁症. She was treated for clinical depression. 她接受了临床抑郁症的治疗。

quiz.question: _____ impression
quiz.explanation: 印象, 第一印象. First impression is often lasting. 第一印象往往持久。

quiz.question: obsession ____
quiz.explanation: 痴迷, 痴迷于. His obsession with details slowed progress. 他对细节的痴迷减缓了进展。

quiz.question: _________ scission
quiz.explanation: 分裂, 政治分裂. The party faced political scission. 该党面临政治分裂。

quiz.question: ____ abscission
quiz.explanation: 脱落, 叶子脱落. Autumn triggers leaf abscission. 秋天触发叶子脱落。

quiz.question: rescission ______
quiz.explanation: 撤销, 撤销通知. The company sent a rescission notice. 公司发送了撤销通知。

quiz.question: ______ submission
quiz.explanation: 提交, 正式提交. The proposal required formal submission. 该提案需要正式提交。

quiz.question: admission ______
quiz.explanation: 入场, 入场券. Visitors must present an admission ticket. 访客必须出示入场券。

quiz.question: ___ remission
quiz.explanation: 减免, 税收减免. The government granted tax remission. 政府批准了税收减免。

quiz.question: _____ commission
quiz.explanation: 佣金, 销售佣金. Agents earn sales commission on transactions. 代理商在交易中赚取销售佣金。

quiz.question: _____ intermission
quiz.explanation: 中场休息, 电影中场休息. There was no movie intermission during the film. 电影期间没有中场休息。

quiz.question: concussion ________
quiz.explanation: 脑震荡, 脑震荡协议. Athletes follow strict concussion protocol. 运动员遵循严格的脑震荡协议。

quiz.question: _____ percussion
quiz.explanation: 打击乐, 小军鼓打击乐. The drummer played snare percussion. 鼓手演奏小军鼓打击乐。

quiz.question: _______ fusion
quiz.explanation: 聚变, 核聚变. Scientists research nuclear fusion energy. 科学家研究核聚变能源。
